text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, on goh, ki mast hasted, girdi namoz magarded, to ʙidoned, ki ci megued. Va niz dar holi canoʙat, to ƣusl kuned, magar on ki rohguzar ʙosed. Va agar ʙemor jo dar safar ʙuded, jo az makoni qazoi hocat ʙozgastaed, jo ʙo zanon cimo' kardaed va oʙ najofted, ʙo xoki pok tajammum kuned va ruju dasthojatonro ʙo on xok mash kuned. Alʙatta Xudo avfkunanda va omurzanda ast
